Original:
當那道低調的霧玻璃門打開，
進入這家隱匿在繁忙城市中的清酒吧，
一陣美食與清酒的香氣就迎面而來，
彷彿瞬間帶到了遠離塵囂的日本山間小屋。

裡面坐滿了喜愛清酒的顧客，
每個人臉上都透露出對於這裡特有氛圍的喜愛。
酒吧裡的燈光柔和且溫暖，
配上沉著冷靜的裝潢，
營造出一種與世隔絕的氛圍，
仿佛整個空間都懸浮在時間的緩慢流動之中。

我跟朋友選擇坐在吧檯前，
感受著吧台上的木質質感。
面前的清酒們精心的排列著，
展示了各種不同種類的清酒，
從清爽的純米大吟釀到濃厚的吟釀原酒，
應有盡有⋯

店員很貼心的走過來，
有禮貌地介紹每一款清酒的特色，
就像參加了一場清酒的藝術展。

這家清酒吧不僅僅是一個品酒的場所，
更是一個能夠讓人放鬆身心，
感受到日本文化深度的空間。

不僅品味到了美味的清酒，
更感受到了一種與世無爭的寧靜，
彷彿置身於日本的一角，流連忘返，十足推薦。

一個人就點了4000塊 實在是忍不住😶‍🌫️
EN:
When the low -key fog glass door opens,
Enter this bartend bar hidden in the busy city,
The aroma of a gourmet and sake comes on the face,
It seemed to be brought to the Japanese hut far away from the hustle and bustle.

It is full of customers who love sake,
Everyone's face reveals the love of the unique atmosphere here.
The lights in the bar are soft and warm,
With calm and calm decoration,
Create an atmosphere that isolated from the world,
As if the entire space was suspended in the slow flow of time.

I chose to sit in front of the bar with my friends,
Feel the wood texture on the bar.
The sake in front of the sake is carefully arranged,
Demonstrate various types of sake,
From the refreshing pure rice big yin to the thick yin -brewed original wine,
There is everything ...

The clerk came here intimately,
Polly introduce the characteristics of each sake,
It's like participating in an art exhibition of sake.

This sake bar is not just a place for wine tasting,
It is also one that can relax the body and mind,
Feel the depth of Japanese culture.

Not only does it taste delicious sake,
I also feel a kind of tranquility that is unsuccessful,
As if in the corner of Japan, lingering forgotten, it is recommended.

I ordered 4,000 yuan alone. I can't help it 😶‍🌫️

EN: There are many types of sake, and the introduction is very detailed. I have tried a lot of sake that I have never been drinking. The food also performs well. The atmosphere is easy and comfortable. It is pretty good.

Original:
參與肝苦人的活動時，我們是預約八點座位，八點二十才上餐，九點被告知後面仍有客人等候，用餐時間已結束。
但旁邊有原本坐吧臺的客人，比我們早進去，用餐完卻被移至座位區繼續喝酒。
如果用餐時間如此短暫，是否能在第一時間就進行告知義務。

最後因為這次未能提前得知用餐時間，而無法好好用餐，導致體感不佳。
EN:
When participating in the activities of liver suffering, we made an appointment for eight o'clock, and we went to the meal at 8:20. At 9 o'clock, there were still guests waiting for the later, and the meal time was over.
However, there were guests who originally sitting on the bar, earlier than us, but they were moved to the seat area to continue drinking.
If the meal time is so short, can it be informing the obligation as soon as possible.

In the end, because I couldn't learn the meal time in advance, I couldn't eat well, resulting in poor physical sensation.
